Reviews.Title: where's the camera?
Reviews.Author: sharky
Reviews.Content: Good DEAL for the price,the phone works great,but thier's no camera,i guess they take it out when they refurbish it,very disappointed!!!

Reviews.Title: Casio G'zOne - Batteries don't charge!
Reviews.Author: MARIA
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a Christmas gift. Worked the first day because the battery was partialy charged. Next morning found out it wasn't charging. Requested a new battery and had the same problem.  Will not be ordering one of these phones ever again. Found out this is a common problem with these phones.

Reviews.Title: PHONE DEFECTIVE
Reviews.Author: Susan Beavers
Reviews.Content: I RECEIVED ONE PHONE THAT WAS DEFECTIVE WITHIN 30 DAYS...THEY REPLACED IT AND IT HAPPENED AGAIN.....THEY SUGGESTED THAT I DAMAGED THE PHONE AND WOULD NOT REPLACE IT. WE TOOK BITH PHONES TO VERIZON WHERE THEY CONFIMED THE CONNECTION FOR THE CHARGER WAS NOT CONNECTED PROPERLY AND THEREFORE WAS DEFECTIVE...DO NOT ORDER FROM THIS COMPANY....100 DOLLARS FOR A PHONE WAS A WASTE OF MY TIME AND MONEY NOT TO MENTION THE VERY POOR SERVICE FROM THE COMPANY....

Reviews.Title: Good Phone
Reviews.Author: Listening
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone because I had one before just like it, but now Verizon discontinues the backup assistant on this model because they are trying to push everyone into more expensive data plans.  I don't want a data plan that I have to pay high monthly data fees for, or even texting fees, which are a rip off.

Reviews.Title: Dishonest Description
Reviews.Author: Bernadine Barwick
Reviews.Content: This Phone is NOT!!! a no contract phone....You must have a verizon contract to use this phone....Verizon will not activate without a new two year contract!!

Reviews.Title: Battery not great but customer service was
Reviews.Author: Jackie
Reviews.Content: Phone would not hold a charge but the company was very eager to resolve the problem and gave great customer service to rectify the problem. The phone battery wasn't great but the customer service was.

Reviews.Title: it didnt work
Reviews.Author: Beatrice Georgalidis
Reviews.Content: Still waiting on confirmation of return. Battery would not hold a charge and never heard back directly from sender after I returned it. If i do, I will update this!

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Tammy Ivie
Reviews.Content: This phone is exactly what it is advertised to be! It hold up great under rough treatment. Just what my son needed! Still working and bought this a long time ago. great phone, well worth the money! I would recommend this phone to anyone wanting a durable phone that will not break or tare up easily!

Reviews.Title: Hated it
Reviews.Author: Alisha D Markle
Reviews.Content: This phone was cheap, shipping was terrible. if you barely scratched it the paint would come off! not water proof! terrible service on it as well!

Reviews.Title: it stopped working after only having it a week
Reviews.Author: Michelle Steineke
Reviews.Content: it stopped working after only having it a week...felt like it was not good quality...ran into issues right away with the phone being able to dial out, black screens and couldnt answer calls

Reviews.Title: Great price for a solid phone
Reviews.Author: Peter Perez-Castro
Reviews.Content: I wanted to replace my phone without getting into a new contract and was able to get a good deal on this new phone.  Customer service was great.  I had a minor problem with the first shipment and was resolved within a couple of days without any extra costs on my part.  I will look here first the next time I need to replace a CDMA cell phone

Reviews.Title: great customer service
Reviews.Author: James Nimz
Reviews.Content: I owned a Boulder phone before and was very pleased with it. I only wish they floated. I lost one overboard so I reordered a phone from Just Cellular. They sent me a defective phone which had a charging problem. I didn't activate the phone for about a month, because I was traveling, Once I activated the phone I threw away the orginal packaging and lost the original receipt. I thought I would be screwed. I contacted Just Cellular and explained everything to them, they looked up their Amazon records and found my purchase info. They gave me an address, told me to send the defective phone back and let them know when I shipped it. As soon as I shipped it they sent me a new phone in the orginal boxing and apologized for the inconvience. I now have my new boulder and am VERY happy. GREAT job Just Cellular

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: Robert Whichard
Reviews.Content: seems to be a good phone. so far so good. one of my customers is using this device on pageplus.

Reviews.Title: great phone like new
Reviews.Author: william l mills
Reviews.Content: Looked like a new product, I could not have guessed it was a used. So far it has performed like new.

Reviews.Title: Phone looks new, but functions poorly
Reviews.Author: joe
Reviews.Content: Phone looks new, but even with extended life "new" battery, it won't hold a charge for 24 hours. During operation if slight pressure is placed on the housing case, the phone goes to compass, voice command, or several other un-entered, undesirable modes. I'm already looking for another phone, and would like my money back or a replacement after just a few weeks of service. If phone is refurbished, it was not "rebuilt correctly or with the necessary professional care.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as the original GZ1
Reviews.Author: J. Cr "Never enough time"
Reviews.Content: Not as good as the original GZ1. The outer casing cracked, the torx screws are completely rusted, and after a few months the battery won't last a whole day.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Heather Boshinski
Reviews.Content: Package showed up on time and the phone worked great and still does except the battery doesn't stay charged too long but I have not seen one of these phones that do. Can't complain about the price either.

Reviews.Title: Oldie, but a goodie
Reviews.Author: whytlion
Reviews.Content: The phone was in great shape. I wanted to go back to a basic, tough phone and I used to have one of these and loved it. I switched my daughter and my wife back to one and then we could use the push-to-talk feature.

Reviews.Title: C711 Boulder unit
Reviews.Author: allenm
Reviews.Content: Product was delivered in the time duration that is was promised.  The products seems to perform to specs at this time.  Have not employed all the functions at time of review.

Reviews.Title: Bad retailer
Reviews.Author: SB "SB"
Reviews.Content: I have the same phone which apparently came from a more reputable retailer.  I have no complaints whatsoever.  It's a great phone, but you have to find the right retailer. The company from which I bought the phone and accessories is called "Beast Deals". They are on Amazon.  Don't be dissuaded just because you got a raw deal.  It happens.

Reviews.Title: Phone didn't work from day 1
Reviews.Author: Kylee Wear
Reviews.Content: This phone was nonworking! It wouldn't show any numbers that called or that you sent and would not let you save any phone numbers. I took it into Verizon and they said there was no way to fix it.....A waste of time!

Reviews.Title: Not so good,
Reviews.Author: L
Reviews.Content: This  phone is  just terrible.  It's just poorly  made!, cheap, and not like the other durable Casio phones.  Can't wait for my upgrade to get a better phone.  It was bought as Verizon  phone with out any of the features that typically would be on our phone such as your bAck-up assistance..
